title.en: Guru Padmasambhava, Master of the Land of Snows

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Guru Padmasambhava, master of the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: jé gangchen gyi lama guru pejung

text.en: Infinite peaceful and wrathful deities of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: lha tsa sum gyalwa zhitro rabjam

text.en: And unfailing guardians of refuge, the Three Jewels—
text.en-trans: kyab lumé gönpo könchok nam sum

text.en: From the very core of my heart, I pray to you all.
text.en-trans: nyingrü pé tingné solwa deb so

text.en: The pure aggregates and elements of your body are the deity’s illusory form,
text.en-trans: lü pung kham dakpa gyumé lha ku

text.en: The pure wind-element of your speech is by nature the mantra,
text.en-trans: ngak lung kham dakpa ngak kyi rangzhin

text.en: And the pure cognizance of your mind is the maṇḍala of dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: sem dren rik dakpa chökü kyilkhor

text.en: Glorious and incomparable Jalü Dorje, watch over me!
text.en-trans: pal nyammé jalü dorjé khyen no

text.en: Imprisoned in conditioned existence by past actions and afflictions,
text.en-trans: ngön lé nyön wang gi sipé tsönrar

text.en: And buffeted by karma and the vicissitudes of joy and sorrow,
text.en-trans: lé deduk natsok chu yi nyerma

text.en: I lack the autonomy to proceed wherever I choose,
text.en-trans: né gar dro dir dro rangwang mé dü

text.en: And I have no other source of protection but you.
text.en-trans: kyab khyö nam ma tok zhen na mepé

text.en: As I place my sincere and trusting faith in you,
text.en-trans: yi khyé shé depé nying né té na

text.en: Do not allow me to succumb to misdeeds or delusion.
text.en-trans: dak lé ngen trulpé wang duma tong

text.en: O protector, never forsake me in your compassion
text.en-trans: gön khyé kyi tukjé namyang ma dor

text.en: And help me to escape from this misery!Kyé! Kyé!
text.en-trans: duk di né tarpar dzö chik kyé kyé

text.en: As I travel the five long and perilous pathways of being,
text.en-trans: tsé di dang chima bardö zirwé

text.en: Tormented throughout this life, the next, and the bardos,
text.en-trans: lam gyü ngé trang ring yangsar drim tsé

text.en: I have no one else to rely on for refuge and protection.
text.en-trans: kyab kyobpé lo té zhen na mepé

text.en: Free me from the terrors of saṃsāra and its lower realms!
text.en-trans: né khorwa ngendrö jik lé drol shik

text.en: To the supreme pure realm of Sukhāvatī, wherein
text.en-trans: né dakpé zhing chok dewachen du

text.en: Lord Orgyen Padma and Amitābha are inseparable,
text.en-trans: gön orgyen pema nang ta yermé

text.en: The glorious and gracious root guru’s wisdom expanse—
text.en-trans: pal drinchen tsawé lamé tuk long

text.en: To this, the dharma-sphere of my own awareness, transfer me!
text.en-trans: dak rangrig chökyi ying su po shok
